alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 7:59PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Helena, northeastern East Feliciana Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and Amite Counties through 845 PM CST... At 758 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gloster, or 12 miles west of Liberty, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Smithdale, Gillsburg and Easleyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana.
